trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud is eager to gather information on the heretics.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_SEQ_01<tab>Alphinaud asks that you aid him in questioning the Convictors. Make your way around the camp, and learn what you can of the heretic presence in the area.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_SEQ_02<tab>To your frustration, none of the Convictors seem to know anything about Lady Iceheart or her followers. Try questioning the soldier Pierriquet.

TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_SEQ_03<tab>After fruitlessly interrogating dragonslayers of all descriptions, the lowborn soldier, Pierriquet, finally provides you with a valuable piece of information. According to him, heretics in the western highlands are summoned with purple-hued signal smoke. Perhaps your quarry can be made to come to you...
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_TODO_00<tab>Question the Convictors.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Pierriquet.

TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ALPHINAUD_000_000<tab>Surely one of these people will have encountered heretics while out hunting. Pray speak with as many as you can, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_JANTELLOT_000_001<tab>I've not seen Lady Iceheart myself, but we Convictors range far and wide in search of our prey. Mayhap one of my fellow dragonslayers has a helpful tale to tell.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ALPHINAUD_000_002<tab>While this is, I confess, a somewhat tedious business, one of these people may have valuable knowledge that will save us days of searching.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ESTINIEN_000_003<tab>...I may have erred in seeking the wisdom of these whelps.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_LANCER01607_000_003<tab>Ah, 'tis colder than Lady Iceheart's frost-rimed...uh, soul! Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>! A fine day, is it not?
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ARCHER01607_000_004<tab>Be still! How am I supposed to watch for the distant flicker of dragon wings when my ears are ringing with your incessant chatter!?
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_LANCER01607_000_010<tab>Nay, I know of no heretics. Do you honestly expect me to keep track of every Raitmeaux, Vairemont, and Bertennant that wanders in and out of camp?
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_LANCER01607_000_011<tab>Nay, I know of no heretics. Do you honestly expect me to keep track of every Raitmeaux, Vairemont, and Bertennant that wanders in and out of camp?
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ARCHER01607_000_020<tab>Hm? Are there any heretics in the area? I have not the faintest idea. Why, a heretic could pass under my very nose and I should be none the wiser.

TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ARCHER01607_000_021<tab>I hunt <var 1A 02 /var>dragons<var 1A 01 /var>, my dear <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((fellow)) /var>! The big ones! Forever do I scan the skies for signs of my prey─I care not for the miserable creatures that scurry upon the ground!
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ARCHER01607_000_022<tab>Hm? Are there any heretics in the area? I have not the faintest idea. Why, a heretic could pass under my very nose and I should be none the wiser.

TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ARCHER01607_000_023<tab>I hunt <var 1A 02 /var>dragons<var 1A 01 /var>, my dear <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((fellow)) /var>! The big ones! Forever do I scan the skies for signs of my prey─I care not for the miserable creatures that scurry upon the ground!
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_LUCIAE_000_030<tab>Looking for heretics, you say? Hmph. Why don't you go and bother Pierriquet or someone?
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_LUCIAE_000_031<tab>I've enough trouble keeping these preening fops fed and clothed as it is. 'Tis no business of mine what folk do with themselves out there in the wilds.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_LUCIAE_000_032<tab>Looking for heretics, you say? Hmph. Why don't you go and bother Pierriquet or someone?
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_PIERRIQUET_000_040<tab>Summat I can help you with, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>?
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_PIERRIQUET_000_041<tab>Heretics, is it? Well, I've never seen one meself...but that ain't to say I haven't heard a thing or two.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>We would be grateful for any information you can share with us. The gods know we've gleaned precious little from talking to the rest of these...people.

TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_PIERRIQUET_000_043<tab>If it please milord, I'm Pierriquet─a soldier by trade, though not much of one, if I'm honest. It weren't for the love of stabbing folk that I took up the spear, see.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_PIERRIQUET_000_044<tab>No, it was by order of Ser Jantellot's father. Still, as long as they keep paying me wages, I ain't fussy as to what they have me do.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_PIERRIQUET_000_045<tab>Not everyone's as patient as me, though. Plenty of lowborn lads who get pressed into service start grumbling before they've seen their second battle.

TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_PIERRIQUET_000_046<tab>And once they've got to thinking how unfair it all is, it don't take much for the heretics to turn their heads. From what I hear, the simple promise of freedom tends to do it.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ALPHINAUD_000_047<tab>That may explain how Lady Iceheart was able to expand her following so swiftly.

TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_PIERRIQUET_000_048<tab>Sad to say, some mates of mine gobbled down the heretics' tripe and asked for seconds─told me they were off to the western highlands to light a signal fire. That's how you let the heretics know you're serious about joining their ranks, apparently. Send up some purple smoke, and the bastards come to you.
TEXT_HEAVNA306_01607_ESTINIEN_000_049<tab>...Is that so? Why then...I am minded to start a fire.
